dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Morbidos the Plague Ooze oozes with malevolence as it addresses you, 'Feeble creature, you dare to stand before me, the harbinger of decay?'

playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have the audacity to challenge me? A mere mortal thinking you can defy the power I wield. How amusing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Show no fear and stand your ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impudence! Your insolence will be your downfall. Brace yourself for the wrath of the Plague Ooze!
Reason? There is no reason in the face of corruption and darkness. Prepare to be consumed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Invoke ancient forest spirits for aid.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Forest spirits? Your pathetic attempts at help will be futile. Feel the grip of despair!
Running away? How pathetic. You can flee, but know that the shadow will always follow.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Look for a new strategy to defeat Morbidos.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hesitation is weakness. No matter how you try to outwit me, your end is inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Seek refuge with the elemental spirits.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Elemental spirits? They will not save you from the spreading darkness. Embrace your demise.
Negotiate? There is no compromise with the inevitable. Your resistance is futile.
A futile plea. The Plague Ooze knows no mercy. Prepare for annihilation.
Your submission is acknowledged, but there is no mercy in the realm of decay. Face your fate.
Your attempts at diplomacy amuse me, little one. Speak your thoughts before I engulf you in despair.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Appeal to Morbidos' sense of reason.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reason is but a fleeting concept in the presence of corruption. Your words hold no sway over me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Offer a trade of knowledge for peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? What trivial offering. Your existence means nothing in the face of decay.
You choose to turn your back on the Plague Ooze? So be it. Your fate is sealed, whether you acknowledge it or not.
Silence echoes your cowardice. The shadows will find you, even in your denial.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Turn back and face Morbidos once more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You return to a fate that you sought to escape. Embrace the darkness that envelops you.
